1.0.name: wordpress/simple-style
1.0.description: Simple Style is our new WordPress Theme. It's the next step to increase the number of our available themes. Like Convention and elegantWhite it contains a lot of great features. Also, it is a perfect layout for photo blogs our/and personal blogs. If you have feature requests, you can send us an e-mail.
